review:
Amazing Treatment for Diabetic and pernial abcess  Treatment. 
Before meeting doctor i was on insulin Hb1AC was 9.3 and After 3 months under ayurvedic treatment now HB1AC  is 6.2 , No insulin. 
With proper guidance and continues support avoided major surgery
.Major hospitals was suggested for Surgery 

About Doctor sir, Very friendly and kind enough to listen completely. 
Doctor Explains clearly about root cause , duration of medicine and suggest for the correct medicine. 
Worthy for mone and Definitely alternate treatment for allopathic medicine.
Thank you sir..

Doctor has patiently listened to all my queries and explained everything in detail. He has helped with step by step guidance on how to get out of my problem with proper diet. Though the consultation is only for 30 mins, he has spent for around 1hour. Overall very friendly and advisable doctor for everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am married for 7 years and we planned to have a child after 3 years of our married life. While we were very eager to start a family, I could not get pregnant as easily as I thought. Myself and my husband were living abroad and were quite hesitant to start with any fertility treatment hastily without any proper guidance. 
Hence, I came down to India in 2018 for a health checkup at a renowned hospital in Chetpet, Chennai. After a master checkup, the chief doctor there performed Hysterolaproscopy for a left  tubal disconnection. Also, later I was told that I could get pregnant only through IVF. With no other option left and without asking any 2nd opinion, I underwent all the procedures for IVF. Finally at the end of the IVF procedure, after embryo transplant , it was sad to know that I did not conceive. It was so harrowing to experience that feel, because emotionally and financially it was quite a loss for us. Though the IVF doctor asked me to go for a second attempt immediately even after the failed attempt, I was not physically and mentally prepared for it again.

Thats when I met Dr.Rajesh Verma at Bliss Acupuncture, Vadapalani in November 2019. After talking in detail about my experience and going through my health reports, Dr. Rajesh Verma guided to me undergo an Acupuncture session for a period of 6 months and assured me that I will definitely get pregnant before the completion of this 6 months. It was a 15 day session every month and I also took combination medicines that he suggested along with Acupuncture to improve my overall immunity and better health and fertility. Doctor assured me that I could naturally conceive and if by chance needed also I could try for IUI option and definitely not in need for IVF as I had age and my fertility level was satisfactory. 

With all the confidence that Dr. Rajesh gave me and the best Acupuncture treatment that I got from him and the blessings of the almighty I got pregnant in March 2020. Owing to my time constraint I opted for IUI for my pregnancy. I got pregnant in IUI in my first attempt. 

I am now a happy mom to a BABY BOY. I cannot thank Dr. Rajesh Verma enough for the happiness that I am enjoying today being a mother. I should say, he diagnosed where my problem was and treated me exactly. His accuracy in the treatment is excellent. I highly recommend other people who are trying for pregnancy or not able to get pregnant to have an opinion with Dr.Rajesh Verma before choosing any hasty options as he genuinely guides you in the right path.

Thank you Dr.Rajesh Verma for we are forever Indebted to you for the happy parenthood we are enjoying today.
reply_text: Thank you for such kind words. As a patient you showed immense determination and faith towards acupuncture and our treatment. God bless your family.

But she is healthy after getting treatment for 30 days of acupuncture treatment at that time. It was very good for my mother in law and she got result and recently contacted Dr Verma sir for diabetes problem and that also is  reversed and it was very useful to come to bliss medicare

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Suchi Ayurveda Clinic and consulted with my doctor Dr. Rajesh Verma,  TBH am really satisfied the way he diagnosed and this place is highly recommended.

I visited  along with my close relative  for treatment of particular problem. Doctor was very friendly. During online consult, Dr prescribed  some tests.After taking tests we met the Dr at his hospital.Shock-1.Without even seeing the reports gave the medicine and charged Rs.12500(Apx).Subsequently  on insistence, he has seen the reports and said that the medicines given are correct. 
***** *** *** ** *** ******** *** ***** **** *** ******** ******** **** ****** ******* ******** ************* ** ******** ********* *** *********2He strongly commented that the medicine given by him will not give any side effects. Shock-****** ** ******* ***** ****** ****** ****** ** **** ******** ***  *** ****** *** ***** ******* ******** ********* * ** ** ****** ******** *** ********* *** ************ ********* ****** ********** *** ************** ****** ****** ********* *** ******** ************ ***** ***** **** ***** ** *** ******** *** ******* ****** *** ********. Really very bad experience.************ **** *** **** ** ******* ****** ******** ***** *** **** *******
reply_text: Thank you for your rating. We would like to hear about your sexual health for which u have taken treatment. Our goal is to provide best treatment, exceptional care to all of our patients. Thanks for mentioning very friendly.  We have spent appropriate time for consultation ie. more than 30 minutes for diagnosis and providing treatment for your problems and i had explained that there is no known side effects for sexual ayurvedic medicines which were given by us. And till date no patient has complained about it. You had called within 3 days after consultation and once again explained that you had to take (one of the sos medicines ) one to two capsules per week but on the contrary you took 3 capsules in 3 days continuously and after that you stopped taking our medicines. You should have visited us for gastric problem. And for your information it takes time for ayurvedic medicines to work or show any effect. However you are cured now. Good wishes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He is a really good doctor who identified all my problems by just assessing my pulse. I have visited him two days back and have just started taking the meds he has prescribed. I hope to get relief soon from the long turmoil of my periods and recent Thyroid issues. I recently happened to have skin allergy and rashes. Even that he was able to say without me mentioning anything about it. He is not some random Ayurvedic doctor who prescribes Rishtas and couple of homeopathic meds without even listening to our issues and assessing our pulse. Although I m yet to see any improvements as my course started very recently, the visit has given me a very positive vibe. ****  **** ******** ********* ** ***, I believe this is going to be the end of my sufferings every month. Definitely recommend him !!!!

My daughter aged 9 yrs was suffering from complex type of absent seizure with spasms.. vagus deformity of both legs, which dr Rajesh only could diagnosis. My daughter could not even speak and walk properly. When she was 6 months old I started treatments like physiotherapy there after  speech therapy till last Feb 2016 but in vain. But there was no improvement until I came across this doctor. The doctor is very friendly with kids and listened to all our problems carefully and patiently. He gave one hour of his previous time in the first day. I am very happy with his treatment and have got results in less than a month for speech, absent seizure and spasm. Now she is speaking many words understands and even she walks very well. The consultation and treatment charges very resonable as mention for the problems she had. I would have saved lakhs of money if i would known him 8 yrs before. I strongly recommended his names to all my family and friends.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for such a detailed feedback

review: Dr. rajesh varma is an wounder full person. he will spend more time with the patients and analyse the problem and gives the rite treatment. clinic is nice environment for acupuncture. he was success full in many complicated cases. myself is an example for that. after an year of treatment i dint get any positive result for me. finally i met with him, and he gave me confidence and started the treatment, i believed him and went for regular session. at the end of 6th month i find an positive result in my reports. gradually my pain gets ready during the sessions. without surgery he made me all rite now.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
I was traveling out of Chennai and 2 hrs away from the city I suddenly started having Diarrhoea and vomiting. The situation escalated suddenly as I had Diarrhoea and vomiting for another 3 times within an hour. I was completely dehydrated. We returned back home immediately and I called Dr. Rajesh over phone to explain my situation. He was at his residence. Right away, he prescribed me with an anti-diarrhreal and anti-vomitting tablet as a first aid. And within an hour he drove all the way from his residence to his Vadapalani clinic and handed over me "A Drops", an amazing drops that works like magic curing you. He asked me to mix the drops in a glass of water and take it before my each meal for that day. It worked wonders and I was completely cured by the end of the day.
Dr. Rajesh has a thorough knowledge of all situations and he prescribes you with the best treatment. I have almost stopped going to allopathic doctors and reach out to Dr. Rajesh for all my needs. Thank you doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am suffering from Diabetes Mellitus for the past 5 years with all diabetic complications like diabetic neuropathy, High bp, body pains, fatigue etc. After i met Dr Rajesh i took as suggested by doctor 15 to 30 acupuncture sessions  and ayurvedic medicines  treatment. Although i am from Madurai, i came all the way for treatment. I  am very satisfied as my blood glucose levels is normal ie 87 to 90 checked many times, which was above 250 before treatment, No burning sensation and pain in my foot, now very active after the treatment. I was recommended Bliss Medicare  Centre by my daughter and son-in- law. I am very happy with Doctor's treatment.Thank you
reply_text:
I am very happy that you have traveled all the way from Dindigul  for Treatment and stayed for almost a month to have Acupuncture treatment for your Diabetes mellitus and many other complication related to that. 

You had Stayed in Chennai as you wished to get treatment and then only you wanted to go back to your home town. Your Determination and dedication is really appreciable that you have belief in age old traditional treatment. I have suggested you Acupuncture for 30 sessions and Ayurvedic medicines which you have taken properly that’s why you have got good results regarding burning sensation of your foot was due to diabetes as your blood glucose levels were normal within a month and all the symptoms are not seen anymore. I am happy that you have got good results. 

REGARDING BURNING SENSATION OF YOUR FOOT, ACUPUNCTURE  REALLY WORKS WELL IN COMBINATION WITH AYURVEDA (MEDICINES) 

Please continue the ayurvedic medicines till your blood glucose is maintained within the range for a long period. Your blood glucose was 266 mg/dl fasting and 378 mg/dl Post prandial  before treament and after one month of our treatment your fasting Glucose is 87 mg/dl and Blood Glucose POST PRANDIAL  is 125mg/dl  

Thanks  to you, your daughter and son in law for having faith in our treatment.

Regards 

Bliss Medicare Centre
Vadpalani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met with Dr Rajesh by coincidence. My appointment cancelled with someother Doctor and in a short time I found him. İn 3 days my pain totaly gone. Some previous symptoms released and constipation problem solved in 3 days. I come from Turkey for ayurvedic treatments and I am very happy to have this ancient knowledge. I strongly suggest Bliss Medicare Centre. I'll continue my treatments with him :) he is very honest and well educated. Doctor and his team are very kind and helpful. Thank you all for the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Excellent understanding of my symptoms very quickly and assuring me of a wholistic treatment plan by addressing the root causes with a short term and long term approach. He also explained me the present issues / concerns in my present treatment methods for diabetes & hypertension and suggested various ways to manage it along with the Accupuncture and Ayurvedic treatment and reduce the present medications over a period of time. The doctor was very detailed in his approach, listened to me for good amount of time and paid attention to my specific issues. Overall it was a very satisfactory experience with hope for future.
reply_text: Thank you Mr B R Das

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My son was in very critical condition as i was told by all the doctors. .no one gave hope for my child life. He was suffering from congenital degenerative disease (leukodystrophy). I visited bliss medicare after recommended by my neighbour ** *** *** ***** ** ** ****** *****. We was very positive after visiting the doctor as we had lost hope after many doctors consultation. After few sessions his spacity improved and today after one year he is living a normal life and joined play school two months back...i recommend to my friends and relative... very much satisfied with the treatment and doctor is very friendly...
reply_text: Thank you sir... May God bless your Child

review: Very humble and kind speaking. Patiencely listened all the issues we told..Reasonable pricing as of me.. Thank Doctor Verma garu ..
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently visited mr.rajesh Varma for my hypertension and sexual problems, After 15 days of treatment I am experiencing significant improvement and satisfaction by the medicine provided.Doctor is very kind and attentive to the patients and explain the problem in clear details.I will update further improvements.

Consulted the doctor for treatment of Sinus. Given 5 medicine bottle each for curing a specific ailment ** ** *** **** ** * ****** **** **** ****** ***** ********** but trusted doctor advise on same. ** ****** ** ***** ******* ******** **** ***** No precription of medicines shared despite two reminders over practo. Charged Rs.4000 for 5 bottles of ayurvedic medicines each consisting of 60 tablets effectively Rs.800 per bottle. I am not sure what these medicines are *** ***** ** ******** *** ******* **** **** *** **** * **** *** ********* ******** ********* ******* **** ************ ** ********* *** ******** **** *** **** **** **** ******* *** *** ****** ********** ** ** ******** After few days i realise i should have taken prescription from doctor or atleast made an effort to know if i am getting what i am paying for. Irrespective of the treatment effectiveness any treatment using alternative medicines is never so costly. Despite repeated reminder to doctor i am yet to get the prescription though in one of the feedbacks earlier doctor has mentioned that prescriptions are sent to customers over mail i feel this is not practiced at all in reality since there is no response to my repeated two reminders. Transparency is treatment either with respect to medicines prescribed or their costing  is completely missing. After paying Rs. 4000 for medicines and 500 for consultation, all that a patient can only hope is he will get well soon.
reply_text: As per the records you have visited on 24 Apr 2019, after consultation, you have many issues . You refused for acupuncture treatment as you are very busy and will try to come if time permits. Within 3 days u are expecting results for your chronic sinusitis, it takes few days/ weeks to see improvement. I tried calling and wanted to inform that my staff was on leave for 2 weeks. However we send the prescription thru mail only. For sinus it is 120 tablets not 60 tablets...we had explained you everything regarding treatment and cost after that only we gave you medicines for which you agreed..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I very well recommend both the doctors. They very transparent, positive and they guide me by any means like personal visit, phone call or watsapp messages. I have been to many different hospitals got only temporary relief but again and again I was losing weight and finally got results with acupuncture and ayruveda treatment at Bliss Medicare centre. They not maintain my health but diagnosed which no one could find regarding UTI. I am also cured with urinary tract infection now. I am very confident about the treatment and doctors and their team. Easy accessibility to doctors for any issues. I am very happy to come to this clinic. I have recommended my son for treatment as I am very confident that he will also get good results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good doctor. Visited the clinic and got the better result. Highly recommended to get advice for diabetes.

I have been to this clinic a month ago. I am very happy as my erectile dysfunction, nocturnal emissions and many such problems are taken care by Dr Rajesh in a months time. Now I am confident to marry as I got results to all my problems resolved in a month with acupuncture and medication given by doctor. I am very happy to come here  and never expected this type of results cos I was having these problems past 2 yrs and lost hope that I will regain my manly hood again. Really amazing results will recommend to all my friends

I am very happy with the treatment for all my problems I was having before visiting Dr Rajesh. High Bp, unable to lift my hand and was unable to walk properly. Before coming to Bliss Medicare centre, I had gone to many clinics, hospitals and visited many doctors in 10 days but my condition didn't improve. I met Dr Rajesh Verma and he said to me that dont worry I will take care. Dr did acupuncture within minutes my BP was normal and I could raise my hand very freely without strain. With 5 session of acupuncture I feel completely fit and I have joined my duty with full enthusiasm and feel rejuvenated. Thanks

I was suffering from back pain, Sciatica, numbness and muscular cramps after acupuncture treatment in bliss Medicare centre I am free from pain and numbness within 5 sessions however I completed 15 sessions for best results the basic session as prescribed by doctor. Now after 3 months i have no problem and free from back pain, numbness and sciatica and I am coming once a week for maintenance so that I don't fall sick or get any other health issues. I have recommended many people for this clinic and dr Rajesh. Excellent Doctor in chennai
reply_text: I am happy to know that you are in good health. Thanks  for the recommendations

review: My age is 79 yrs now. I was suffering from severe back pain, spinal edema, spinal tumor, hypertension, constipation and knee pain for the past 20 yrs. I met Dr Rajesh and Dr Poonam 3 yrs back for all above complains regarding my health. After that I started acupuncture and ayurvedic treatment I got relieved of my severe back pain within few days of treatment with all other health issues was also taken care very effectively. Today I regularly have one a week acupuncture for good health as I don't have any more health issue becos of sustained effect and for good health I will continue this treatment... It is my wish to continue acupuncture cos it very effective without side effects. I have already recommended many patients to this Doctor and they have also very satisfied.
reply_text:
Dear Mrs Thangamani

You have been very regular and prompt in having medicines/treatment becos of that u got very good results. I remember that neurosurgeon had recommended operation  immediately due to many complication. Thanks a lot for having faith in our treatment.

review: I was suffering from  muscular disorder (contraction) as there was no treatment in allopathy medicine so I came here for treatment as there no other treatment can help me as I tried many such treatments. Very happy with drs as they very kind and empathic to patients. review: I was suffering from diabetes , hypertension past 3 years and had chest pain and diagnosed with angina pain. I wanted the best treatment as I was told to do angioplasty which would have costed in lacs however I was not ready for such treatment I browsed and found  Bliss medicare centre i immediately took treatment for angina and diabetes.The package costed less than allopathy package and I got results for diabetes, hypertension and angina pain with acupuncture and ayurvedic medicines. I am very satisfied patient

I was treating my dad for gangrene in chennai renowned hospital after 15 days of allopathy medication and doctors couldnt help as it worsened and suggested to ampute my dads toes further as I personally wasn't ready for that option and I started browsing for best solution so I got bliss medicare centre I visited immeditialy next day for treatment as it was recommended for acupuncture treatment and ayurvedic medicines for gangrene with 9 toes was affected before treatment and after 10 days of acupuncture treatment I find very good recovery and feel very happy to get complete cure by this integration approach. I also personally like to recommend to all for any such complications. My personal thanks to Doctors of Bliss Medicare Centre

review: I went for sciatica and low back pain....he promised I will be free from pain and problem in 60 sessions(200% he assured)....apparently even after 75 sessions the extreme pain is still intact....now he says I have to come at least for 1 year..... extremely overpriced....he is doing medicinal marketing instead of curing ailments.....he doesn't come on time......totally wrong commitment....avarice person
reply_text:
Dear Faiz,

It was nice to meet you & your brother for the first time. I was hoping to have a long term Doctor/Patient relationship. 
As you know you were suffering for the last 14 years from chronic back pain, sciatica and immobility as you discussed on the first day of your visit. You told that you had visited many doctors but their treatment didn’t help you much. So you had come to us after going through our positive comments in practo.

As Explained to you on day one of your treatment

1.	Your condition is very chronic and after the basic sessions you will have to take the maintenance session for 1 yr for which you agreed and the treatment was started with your consent. You completed your basic session and got relieved of pain and inspite of my advice for not riding a two wheeler you injured yourselves  while riding a bike. However your deteriorated condition was taken care of promptly. And you got rid of your pain once again. Thereafter you have not followed our protocol as suggested for maintenance sessions and had stop coming without any information for the last one month. However, you have last visited me on 12 May  and you commented that I discussed now about further  treatment of 1 yr which is not true.  And Again I informed not to travel in two wheeler  you have not followed my suggestion and was travelling as a pillion on your brother’s bike.
 
2.	In your feedback you have written that I have always been late for your treatment but let me remind you have sometimes reached prior to your appointment for your monetary benefits from OLA cab and rescheduling the timing according to your convenience but still I accommodated you even during my lunch hours. However you don’t want to be transparent and wanted to defame me with wrong allegations. For your information I have done a lot of free medical camps for the poor and needy people (who can’t afford). This I didn’t want to mention to you cos you will not understand “what is a feeling of being a Doctor”.


3.	 You have also commented about medicinal marketing done by our centre. Let me tell you consultation fees of Rs 500 is clearly mentioned in practo. Secondly one hour acupuncture session with fresh needles additional cost of needles Rs 100 was informed and as you have agreed also.  If I have all my information of practice in practo ie consultation charges with treatments you call  “Medicinal marketing”  but for many other patients it is a boon that they have come to our clinic with reference, feedbacks and content published from Practo. I take my profession seriously and only if you had been equally serious about your treatment your condition would have been better now. 

No regrets and hoping that you get rid of your pain soon.

review:
I am 28 years old. I was struggling with sleeplessness. Doctor was very friendly. He examined by pulse and said that i have some 6 to 7 health issues like high bp, depression, gastric, insomnia, back pain and fear. He was correct. He gave me some 7500 rupees medicine per month for all the health issues. I took the medicines regularly for some 6 months. Almost I spent 45000 for 6 months. ******* ****** **** ** *** ******** ** ********* ***** 
           I even took acupuncture treatment for 15 days. That is again some 10000. 
           ******* ** ****** ********* *** *** **** ******* Then i consulted a allopathy doctor *** ** ****** ********* **** ** ****** ** * ** * ******* **** ***** ********* ****** ** **** ******* ** ****** ***** ** ** *** **** ********* ** ** ********** ** ***** ***** * ***** *** *** **** ******** ****** **** ****
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback and appreciation regarding diagnosis, we have checked  our records when you had visited our clinic ie April 2017 for the above conditions mentioned. 15 sessions of Acupuncture 500 per session and taken ayurvedic ie alternative medicines for Rs 6500 per month for 7 health issues. You are comparing the cost with the efficiency of the medicines. As alternative system works on the root cause of the disease it takes some more time then modern medicine as it works on symptoms effectively in the management of many  health issues like Hypertension, Insomnia etc. I have understood from your feedback that you have taken allopathy for 4 or 5 months approx Rs. 10000 thereafter and you felt better.  We also sometimes recommend to consult doctors in case of hypertension or in acute conditions to take modern medicine as we do encourage other system of medicine given by doctors for relieving of symptoms faster. However we cannot compare the system/therapy with cost and duration as benefits depends on many factors like lifestyle,  diet,  season change etc. I am happy that you got well and cure for all the above conditions.

Regards
Bliss Medicare Centre

review: Have visited twice, taken medicine twice for 2 months, but don't know , y he never gives prescription, no price tag on medicine, thus taking a lot of money, not a single percent benefit I got
reply_text:
Dear Rohit,
Hi, you have visited twice and taken medication for 2 months. We give prescription thru mail with complete details of the medicines. I had sent the prescription and bill on 2nd September 2017, If you haven't received the mail I will send again and i apologise that you haven't received it.
Asthma is very chronic disease and it is not possible to get relief in 40 days. We have to assess your condition after three months of treatment to know for improvement and the medicines prescribed were taken in time or any other condition to be taken care for better results. Surely we will help you in this regard. In your 2nd visit you have not taken medicines as we have suggested. You have not come on 1st week of this month to collect the remaining medicines and only taken medication partly. However please take the medicines regularly as prescribed. I remember that you said some relief in dry cough in the first course of medicines, when taken properly. But now you comment that there is no relief. I am glad that you are visiting this month for continuing the treatment after the conversation over phone we had today.  I have sent again the prescription. 

Hope you get relief at the earliest

Regards
Dr Rajesh Verma DR

review: I went for lack of appetite... doctor checked my pulse and said i have ulcer... i did an endoscopy and found no ulcer or any stomach issues...* **** ****** ****** ** ** ****** ******** ******** ***** ******* ********* *********
reply_text:
Dear Anand, 
Hi,
You visited our clinic with the problem of loss of appetite on 4th December 2017. As we take complete history of the patient by not only pulse diagnosis but also try to find the sign and symptoms of the disease by questioning and suggesting further test. There are various causes for Loss of appetite including psychological factors like Stress, Anxiety, Depression, loss of taste, bloating, chronic illness, ill effects of medication etc. You, in any case, had not agreed with any of the above reasons for your problem and you insisted that you have already got the endoscopy done few months back which was not reproduced at the time of consultation... That’s the reason why I suggested further investigation before starting any treatment. However, If u have done latest test and there is no issues... It is a good sign.
Regards
 Dr Rajesh Verma

Dear S Manigandan,
Thanks for your feedback. You have got results in 8 session ie last visited our clinic for sciatica on 31 march 2016. Now  once again you have come after 2 1/2 months for ankle injury (mild fracture) with swelling which was due to your participation in Live show of Mr & Mrs Khiladi (Zee Tamil) as you had fallen from 40 feet height.  I saw good improvement in 2 session of acupuncture in your ankle injury with no pain and swelling. It is good to know that you did not develop sciatica again. Please take care and may god bless you.
 
Best of luck for your daring act in live show.

As per our records you had visited on 18 Sep 2021 and only had consulted for erectile dysfunction paid Rs.600/-.and not opted to take medicines.

 At the age of 26 you have erectile problem so i had to diagnose the root cause of your chief compliant and found 4 comorbidities not 20 and i also discussed in detail like life style changes, diet plan and medicines was suggested to you. If u buy the medicine online it will cost you not less than several hundreds. Neither I nor my staff compelled you to take medicine from us in this period of 3 months from your date of consultation.
